LightningComponentBundle.description: Utility navigation component with mobile menu option

property.name: container
property.label: Container
property.description: Wrap the navigation in a centered page container
property.datasource: none, default, small, medium, large, x-large

property.name: mobileHamburger
property.label: Show mobile hamburger icon?
property.description: Display a hamburger menu on mobile

property.name: inverse
property.label: Inverse
property.description: Use inverse text color if a dark background color is defined

property.name: userLink1IsButton
property.label: Is button?
property.description: Display a button instead of a link.

property.name: userLink1OpenInNewPage
property.label: Open User Link 1 in new page?
